fields.name: Privilegien, privileges
fields.value: Dr. phil., white german, cis, straight-passing, non-disabled passing

fields.name: I'm [incomplete list]
fields.value:
...a feminist and view trans rights as human rights.
...an eater of a plant-based diet and concerned about planetary health.
...thankful if I'm being called out for racist, antisemitic, ableistic, sexist or misogynist speech or behavior.
...a lover of art

fields.name: Ich habe [unvollständige Liste]
fields.value:
...Germanistik und Evangelische Theologie studiert.
...mehrere unfertige Romane oder Romanideen in der Schublade.
...mehr Sprachen gelernt als ich spreche.
...immer noch Hoffnung.
